description: Complete TGFPRO products dashboard with advanced filters, metrics, UI enhancements and performance optimizations

userStories.title: Create ProductFiltersSidebar component with collapsible layout
userStories.description: As a user, I want a sidebar with advanced filters to narrow down product searches.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement collapsible sidebar with toggle button
Add basic layout structure with form elements

userStories.title: Implement price range filter with slider
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter products by price range using a slider.
acceptanceCriteria: Install and configure react-range for price slider
Add min/max price inputs with slider control
Update product filters state to include price range
Apply price filter to API calls

userStories.title: Add status filter (active/inactive)
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter products by their active/inactive status.
acceptanceCriteria: Add radio buttons or select for status filter
Update filters state and API integration

userStories.title: Implement category/group filter with API integration
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter products by category using data from /tgfgru endpoint.
acceptanceCriteria: Create hook to fetch groups from /tgfgru
Add dropdown select for group filter
Apply group filter to product queries

userStories.title: Create DashboardCards component with key metrics
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see key metrics on the dashboard like total products, active/inactive counts.
acceptanceCriteria: Show active vs inactive product counts
Add out of stock count if available

userStories.title: Implement category distribution chart
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a chart showing product distribution by categories.
acceptanceCriteria: Create chart component for category distribution
Fetch data from products API grouped by category

userStories.title: Add dark/light theme toggle with persistence
userStories.description: As a user, I want to switch between dark and light themes with my preference saved.
acceptanceCriteria: Add theme toggle button to header/sidebar

userStories.title: Implement lazy loading for components
userStories.description: As a developer, I want components to load lazily to improve initial bundle size.
acceptanceCriteria: Convert heavy components to use React.lazy
Add Suspense boundaries with loading fallbacks
